articles.title: To kick off celebrations of America's founding, Trump travels to its heartland - NPR
articles.description: President Trump will give a speech in Iowa Thursday night as the official start to a year of events marking the country's 250th anniversary. It comes at a crucial time for his domestic policy agenda.
articles.content: President Trump will deliver a speech in Iowa Thursday night launching a year of "America250" events for the country's 250th anniversary while Republican leadership races to pass his "One Big Beautif… [+2178 chars]
